inn1.comm: back of a length, angling across, Sehwag stands tall - and breaking news - defends the first ball towards cover
false sense of security that was for Mitch, shortish and widish - nothing horribly wrong with this one, but Sehwag launches it over point, and it keeps going over the boundary
closer to the stumps this time, Sehwag still manages to make some room, but plays this one to point, along the ground
slower delivery, wide, Sehwag thinks of a six repeat, but lets it go

bowled him, first real full delivery, it swings, Sehwag is caught at the crease and beaten by the inswing, and off and middle are hit. This is a similar dismissal to that in Delhi, same combination: Sehwag b Johnson. Full, swinging in, gate created, stumps pegged back
hint of swing, fullish, around off, defended to cover
oh Mitch you beauty, another off stump knocked out, full, swinging, pitching off, holding its line, Gambhir closes the bat face, looking to play it to on, and the off stump goes for a walk
full, outside off, left alone
back of a length, Tendulkar stands tall, and pushes it off the back foot
hint of swing again, fuller, around the middle stump line, defended towards midwicket
inside edge on the pads, not big swing but slight inward shape, from around the off-stump line
this is the one going with the angle, pitched full outside off, Tendulkar plays for swing, this one takes the outside half of the bat
maiden over, outside off, short of a length, left alone by Tendulkar
squares him up, slight movement away from Yuvraj, thick outside edge goes wide of point
good shot, goooood shot, full, hint of swing, on the pads, just guided with a bat face closing in at the right time. Not much power, but teases midwicket all the way to the boundary
this one goes across him with the angle, defended off the front foot
full delivery, starts wide, goes away with the angle, and left alone
push-drive, gets front foot close to the pitch and plays close to the body, can't beat extra cover
bouncer, on target, Tendulkar sways out of the way, hands dropping down
angling in to the pads, Yuvraj misses on the glance
short ball, good short ball, on target, aimed somewhere near Yuvraj's right shoulder, gets out of the line, does Yuvraj
fuller ball, outside off, plays it with an open face, wide of second slip, all along the ground
gets on to front foot early, lets the ball come on and closes the bat face on it, and gets a single to wide of mid-on
back of a length, outside off, pushed towards mid-off
flicked away beautifully off the pads, length ball, all wrists, bisects mid-on and midwicket, and what a fast outfield this is
another boundary, is there a counterattack on? short ball, stays on the back foot, cuts it perfectly between cover-point and backward point
back of a length, played with an open face towards point, bat face turning in the hand
fuller ball now, not much swing, around off, defended back to the bowler
quick single, off the back foot he turns it to wide of midwicket and an early call makes it a comfortable one
excellent fielding at cover by Voges, dives full length, it was a well-timed push, and by the looks of the outfield he has saved four here
full ball, outside off, still some swing, Yuvraj pulls his bat out of the way pretty late, no edge though

superb reflex, the little big man is gone, caught and bowled. This is not even a slower ball, 131ks, Tendulkar is early into the front-foot shot, it stops a touch on it, takes the inside half of the bat and Bollinger reacts fast to take it with both hands. This was not even bowled cross-seam, and was dragged from outside off to Bollinger
good bounce, digs it in, outside off, Dhoni drops his wrists and lets it go
delayed appeal, there was a noise even as Dhoni left the ball alone, shaped in late, and replays show he was a goner. It was just a late shout, and it didn't look out live time
full ball, outside off, and left alone
this time Michael Hussey saves four, full ball, driven on the walk by Dhoni, and Hussey dives full-length to his right, high fives all around
short this time, Dhoni leaves it alone, again it tails back towards him, pretty close to being like the earlier shout that was not given
comprehensively beaten outside off, length ball, on off, swinging away, Yuvraj pokes tentatively
full and attacking stumps this time, Yuvraj defends it towards cover
wide enough of off this time for Yuvraj to shoulder arms to it
again, starts wide of off, and left alone
closer to off, back of a length, pushed to cover
fuller ball, outside off, Yuvraj leaves it alone, more circumspect after Tendulkar's wicket
left alone outside off again, angling across Dhoni
pitches it up, looking for swing, but this goes across Dhoni who leaves it alone
shorter, angling across, and left alone again, almost like Test cricket, and rightly so
stays low this time, bounces twice before reaching Manou, who fumbles and the batsmen steal a bye
full ball, on the pads, driven straight to mid-on

bowled him, freak dismissal, Yuvraj is bemused when he crosses Dhoni. Back-of-a-length delivery, hits the pad, bounces over his right shoulder, topspins, Yuvraj while trying to get his bat back in the crease gets a faint touch from the back of bat onto the stumps, the bail trickles over. Australia all over India
full and wide, left alone, and called
full ball again, played close to his body, wide of cover for one
stays on back foot, just short of length, around off, and defended
if it's Raina, it must be the bouncer, gets him to jab at this delivery aimed at his chest, just slides down the leg side
fuller this time, and has Raina playing off the back foot towards midwicket
full and fast, 147ks, on the back foot again, and played back to the bowler
shorter this time, around off, defended off the back foot
tame dismissal, but what field placement, length ball, around middle, and Raina plays in front of his body. it stopped a touch on him, and he lobs the flick to the superbly placed short mid-on
short, just outside off, Dhoni shoulders arms
fuller delivery, driven on the walk, but one-bounce to Bollinger
full again, outside off, angling across, and left alone by Dhoni
back of a length, angling across Dhoni, and left alone again
length ball, around off, slight shape in, and defended off the front foot
floated outside off, left alone, third consecutive maiden for Bollinger
full ball, on the pads, defended towards leg
bouncer now, just outside off, Jadeja sways out the line
length ball, around off stump, defended off the front foot
back of a length, outside off, Jadeja leaves it alone
nearly another wicket for Johnson, Jadeja plays away from the body, outside edge, and it falls, rather dips, agonisingly short of Cameron White at first slip
fullish ball, outside off, defended with an open face
strays onto the pads, full too, and Jadeja closes the bat face on it and gets one
starts in the channel around off, fuller than good length, Jadeja comes forward and defends
puts in more shoulder this time, back of a length, 132ks, and pushed back off the back foot
don't run Ravi, don't, looks to drop and run this time, this has gone straight to cover, and Dhoni says a clear NO
fuller and wide outside off, and left alone
well left for one, Jadeja was shouldering arms, but the ball goes off the face of his bat towards third man, all along the ground

and now there is seam movement, Dhoni leaves alone what looks like an innocuous delivery outside off, but it jags back in and passes very close to the off stump. Dhoni had them covered, though. Manou makes a good collection, diving down the leg side
flighted, around leg, defended
another flighted ball, short of length, and Jadeja presses forward and defends
quicker one, and slightly shorter, left alone outside off
another short delivery, forced away into the off side for a single
full delivery, Dhoni looks to defend around his pad, is beaten but has got the pad outside the line
flatter this time, Dhoni drives on the walk again, straight to midwicket
beaten outside off, back of a length, angling away, Jadeja - no feet - leaves the bat hanging and the ball misses the edge
fuller ball, around leg stump, shaping towards middle, defended
left alone this time, started just wide of off and angled away
around off stump again, back of a length, Jadeja comes on the front foot and defends
another good delivery, starts middle, moving towards off with the angle, defended off the front foot

another maiden, another delivery angling away, Jadeja comes forward and defends and looks for one, Dhoni says no, but this has gone wide of mid-off and there is a single here. Who believes Jadeja's calls nowadays?
flighted delivery, Dhoni steps out and takes a single to long-on
turn and bounce, what a jaffa, flighted outside off, and explodes away, beaten comprehensively
leading edge, almost carries back to Hauritz
double appeal, safe both ways. Turn and bounce again, click sound as the ball passes the bat, and Manou calls for stumping. Turns out, bat hit the pad, and Jadeja hadn't dragged his foot out
this is an easier delivery, fuller and around leg, and defended
big shout, arm ball, Jadeja looks for a forward defensive, and is done in by the angle. Would have hit just outside the line of off. Good shout nonetheless
length ball, around off, Dhoni walks down the track and defends
back of a length, around off, Dhoni stays back and defends
outside off this time, Dhoni covers the stumps, and shoulders arms
comes down the track, trying to disturb McKay's rhythm, gets a single off the inside half of the bat
turned off the pads for a single to deep backward square
walks down the track, turns it to square leg for one
flighted, outside off, turning, Dhoni presses forward and defends
sharp turn there, Dhoni's forward defensive is beaten, safe he is but
that's fourtunate, looks to turn this one to square leg, and gets the middle of the outside edge (that's how thick it is), and it runs away for four to third man
defended off the front foot again
bat-pad there, but there isn't one, sharp turn again, inside edge onto pad, and it falls safely
helps this one around the corner for single
on target McKay is, the ball stays low too, Dhoni semi-crouches in defence
another ball that hurries Dhoni who can't walk out because keeper is up, defended to leg
smart shot, opens the face at the last moment, gets it past slip for a single
full delivery, aimed at middle, defended off front foot, McKay appeals. he reckons it's pad-first. it is indeed, but it hit him outside the line
outside off this time, defended with an open face
short, outside off, slashes at it, gets a thick edge that beats slip and third man
flighted, around the leg-stump line, turned around towards square leg
tosses it up outside off, Dhoni stretches forward to defend
flat delivery now, defended back to the bowler
gets onto the front foot and watchfully plays it to mid-on
another sharp turner, from outside off,and Dhoni manages to keep it down
fuller this time, easier for Dhoni to play, turns it around the corner. Another maiden over
full, around off, played towards cover
pulls the length back, immaculate line, pitching middle, angling towards off, defended off the back foot
runs this one off the face of the bat to third man, 50 up for India, almost 20 overs gone
length delivery, just outside off, Dhoni defends it off the front foot, very watchful
stays slightly low again, and on target too, Dhoni semi-crouches again to keep it out
has he dropped him at backward point? Rare loose delivery, short and wide, and Dhoni cuts, in the air, dipping in front of Voges. It didn't carry
sharp turn and bounce again, angling in, pitching off, and kicking away. Beaten
short ball, cut away for one
sharp turn again, pitches middle, takes the glove on the way, gets two to fine leg
Dhoni looks to break free, steps out, aims at vacant leg side, misses by a mile, but his body covers the line of the ball
immediately into action, but it's off his thigh
arm ball now, angling across Dhoni, defended off the back foot
starts off on target, back of a length, defended off the back foot
angled across Jadeja, and played to cover
fuller ball this time, driven away from his body, but safe, gets one
back of a length, cramps him up, pushed back to the bowler
another back-of-a-length delivery, pushed back to the bowler again
cutter this time, around off line, defended again
starts off with another sharp turner, beats Jadeja outside off again
arm ball tried, shout for lbw, but angling down the leg
cuts aerailly, first bounce to backward point
turn again, outside off, Jadeja keeps his bat well inside the line
half a step taken down the track, defends to cover
flatter delivery, defended off the back foot
pushed away off the back foot, bounces over Voges at point, who gets a hand on. Single it will be
on target, off-stump line, Jadeja defends it back to the bowler
sharp single, drops it and runs, towards midwicket
almost chopped on, goes for the cut, gets the inside edge but his stumps are safe
pushed off the back foot, to sweeper cover for one
on the pads, turned away off the front foot, gets two to wide of midwicket
flat delivery, pushed away towards cover
Dhoni steps out, bunts it around his front pad, gets a single to square leg
turn again, beaten again outside off. Hauritz has troubled Jadeja royally
gets too straight this time, turned off the pads for one
paddles it  from outside off, for single
straight deliveries, on the stumps, played back to the bowler
Watto stays on target, making Dhoni play, he defends this length delivery back to the bowler
short and slightly wide, and cut away to sweeper-cover
dabs it away from outside off, gets a single down to third man
beaten outside off, this one bounced a bit more than expected, and beat Dhoni's attempt to turn it down to third man
gets on to the front foot, and pushes a length delivery to sweeper-cover
angling across Jadeja who drives away from the body and is beaten
lossener, short, wide and slow, and it's the slowness that defeats the attempted cut shot
dances down the track, plays it around his front pad, and gets a single to square leg
flat delivery, outside off, Jadeja goes back and pushes it down to long-on
slow in the air, around off, Dhoni goes back and defends
flighted around middle, Dhoni presses forward and defends
shorter delivery, plays it to left of cover and runs a sharp one
pitches on a length and he defends it back watchfully
shorter ball outside off, cut into the ground in front of Voges at point
streaky runs from Dhoni, who flirts with a fuller ball outside off and gets an edge off the twirling bat, it runs away fast and gets Johnson into play down at third man
fullish again and he comes out and clips the ball to midwicket
leans into an overpitched ball and drives nicely past cover-point
good length and he steers it to Voges at backward point off the front foot
tossed up well wide of off stump and it turns away
fuller just outside off and he comes forward and turns it to midwicket
slower through the air, again full, and he defends it back
gets some room and pushes the ball wide of point for one
slower one tossed up on middle and leg and Dhoni defends
tossed up on a length and he goes back and pushes it back
goes back and runs the ball down to third man for a single
fuller ball, middle and off, cuts in gently and Dhoni pushes it back
good ball again, subtle movement in and he pushes to cover
a bit fuller outside off and he leans into a good-looking drive to extra
again he pushes a drive but this time picks the gap at cover-point
slower ball, fullish outside off, he feels for it and gets an inside edge behind the stumps to get Watson excited but all is well in the end for Jaddu

and he strikes first ball! Dhoni is not happy! This is pitched within stumps, and there is no swing, hence missing the off stump, if not by much. Dhoni is not pleased with the call, but he was gone earlier, caught behind to the same bowler, but was not given
crisp drive first up, away from body, towards cover
consecutive duck for Harbhajan, played on, India are crumbling now, back of a length, got slightly big on him, Harbhajan gets an inside edge into the middle stump

push-drive outside off, and this one s along the fast outfield, Marsh chases it down all the way, and seems he makes a great save, but while he is getting rid of the ball the knee touches the skirting at the boundary
back of a length, on the pads, defended into the on side
no ball, puts in a bit extra into this short one, PK defends it comfortably
and full and wide outside off he goes, PK has already made a lot of room and sees the ball go undisturbed to the keeper
steps forward, and turns it around the corner for one
flighted outside off, PK comes forward and defends
flat delivery, turning in, defended off the back foot
slower now, drift too, turns in from outside off, PK gets forward, is beaten, but the pad is the second line of defence
another sharp turner, but it's wide outside off, and he lets it go
full stretch, forward defensive, it almost carries back to Hauritz
back of a length, outside off, Jadeja plays a nothing waft, and is beaten
fuller ball, off-stump line, pushed to cover
another waft, another nothing shot outside off, and beaten again, this was even closer to the edge
and again, this one was even wider, no feet movement, and Jadeja survives another suicide attempt
this time he is beaten off the front foot, just outside off, just short of driving length, holds its line, and misses the edge
finally he gets the edge, but this is played with soft hands, and wide of first slip at any rate, four lucky runs
big turn from outside off, but slow, and PK goes deep into the crease and turns it around the corner
short and flat, Jadeja goes back and cuts it to sweeper-cover
flat offbreak, just outside off, PK defends off the back foot
slower in the air this time, he plays it for one to square leg
flat and quick delivery, middle-stump line, played back to bowler
late-cut, wide of third man, gets a two
angled across PK, he goes for a waft and misses. That's become Bollinger's fate
digs this one in short, PK moves out of the line and plays it with an open face towards sweeper-cover
after playing and missing several times, Jadeja connects, and sweeetly, the cut has gone only yards to the left of third man but beats him because it is times well
full delivery on the pads, hit straight to mid-on
hits the back-of-a-length spot again, around off stump, pushed back by Jadeja
full delivery, outside off, played with an open face, gets one to wide of point
played off the hips, towards square leg, NO is the call
almost played on, almost run out, the inside edge off Jadeja's bat goes to right of Manou, PK wants a run, it's his call, but Jadeja vehemently says no, PK makes it half way and then gets back also
full delivery, middle-stump line, defended back to bowler
offcutter, pitches just outside leg, cuts away towards off, Jadeja gets onto the front foot and defends
length ball, angling across Jadeja who gets onto the front foot and defends
shorter, gives Jadeja room, he gets tall and pushes it through the off side
starts with a full delivery on off-stump line, defended to cover
length ball, outside off, and forced away to left of sweeper-cover, but they get only one
driving length, just outside off, PK plays for swing, this goes straight, and is beaten
plays a fullish delivery with soft hands towards mid-off and takes a sharp single
angles onto the pads, and Jadeja flicks it away for India's 100th run
PK makes room and swings almightily, and connects air
back of a length, on off line, played towards short cover
just back of driving length, on and around off, played to wide of short cover
PK looks to get inside the line and run it down to third man, the ball follows him and just misses the edge
fuller, on the stumps, defended off the crease back towards bowler
keeps hitting the length, stump to stump, and PK plays it towards short cover
sharper delivery, outside off, Praveen looks to run it down to third man and misses by a bit
angles into the pads, Jadeja bunts it towards square leg and comes through for one

PK makes room and slashes at this short delivery, and somehow it goes between mid-off and extra cover, and the outfield carries this mistimed shot for three. The way PK is swinging, may as well call for the Powerplay
full, on middle, hit too hard to mid-on to come for one
short delivery outside off, Jadeja gets on the top of the bounce and dabs it down to third man
offcutter, starts around off, PK opens the face, the cut takes it away and misses the edge
quick and straight this time, 148ks, PK hangs his bat outside off, but Johnson misses it
length ball on the pads, turned away towards fine leg for one
clears mid-off by inches, PK makes room and throws his arms at a length ball, and gets just enough elevation
pulls the length back a bit, PK defends off the back foot towards cover
slower ball, back of the hand, low fulltoss, PK doesn't see it immediately and gets one to third man
length ball, on pads, and he flicks it away for one
lovely clean hit, PK sees the mid-off has been sent back, hence picks a length ball up and drags it over - well over - mid-on, one bounce into the boundary
short and wide, pushed away, can;t beat backward point
length ball, but no room, Jadeja comes forward and defends
looks to open the face and get a single to third man, but he ends up playing it straight towards point
straighter delivery, Jadeja turns it towards leg but can't beat midwicket
dropped by Bollinger at mid-off, after four dot balls, Jadeja stepped out and hit straight to mid-off, and Bollinger got it low to his right, on his thumb, and let it got for four too
full, on the pads, flicks it towards deep backward square to get to his 50. Fighting knock, he has struggled, he has been lucky, but he has hung in
length ball, Jadeja flat-bats it down to long-off for one
slower ball, sees it early, plays a controlled check-drive, but can't beat extra cover
another slower ball, he picks it early again, makes room and hits it over the cover field. Fifty of the partnership comes up
full delivery, PK cue-ends it down to long-on
leg-side half-volley, helped away to deep backward square
full and fast this time, PK goes for the straight loft and misses
and is welcomed by a charging-down Jadeja who slaps this length delivery past Watson, beating mid-off
looks to run it down to third man, but ends up playing it to point
short and wide, slashed away, single down to third man
walks across the stumps to try and beat short fine, and is beaten, the ball misses the leg stump by inches. Good umpiring not to call it a wide
back of a length, into the body, played to wide of mid-on for one
looks to clear his front leg and pull, it's too full for the shot, and he ends up playing it back to the bowler, on the bounce
is that PK or is that Dhoni? half-volley, plays a forehand topspin off the baseline, Dhoni-style, the bat twirls in the hand, getting him the power, and it's dead straight
fuller, and driven straight to extra cover
pulls the length back, outside off, and PK looks to open the face and is beaten
another half-volley, another Dhoni shot, along the ground this time, the topspin carries it to wide of long-on
PK is giving himself some runs to bowl to, makes room and drives inside out, through the covers
he is enjoying some luck too, slower ball, he throws his hands at it again, the ball takes the top edge and lobs over point and sweeper-cover has to put in the dive to prevent a boundary
and he strikes first ball again. That's his five-for. premeditated pull, clears his front leg but it's too full and ends up lobbing a simple catch to midwicket. End of a fighting knock
back of a length, angled across Nehra who lets it go
fuller ball, Nehra gets his pad outside the line and defends
no-ball, effort delivery, gets it high towards Nehra's chest, who sways out without trouble
he changes his full-and-wide plan on free hits, digs it in short, Nehra steps out, swings, misses
fuller delivery, angling across, Nehra hangs his bat out and is beaten
slower ball, from round the sumps, played with an open face towards third man
back of a length, around off, defended towards cover
short and wide, Nehra dabs it towards third man
back of a length, cutting in a bit, PK is cramped for room and he pushes it to cover
dropped by Voges, that was a dolly, PK made room and swung, bottom hand came off, and Voges let go a simple catch at cover
casual running, taking a sharp single to midwicket, but Nehra neither hurries nor slides his bat in. Ponting's attempt at stumps missed by a bit, else would have been interesting
full ball, driven down the ground
length ball, outside off, played with open face to point
another important strike, makes room, takes the short ball from in front of his face and clears midwicket
full, wide of off, PK makes room and misses
yorker, around leg, PK makes room again, and gets a single to sweeper-cover
low fulltoss, driven down to long-on
that's his maiden fifty! Beamer too. That was a high fulltoss, chest high, sways away makes room and guides it to point boundary. What an innings
yorker, and he digs it out and gets a single
makes room and swings through the line again, gets a single to long-off
slower ball, looks to turn it leg, misses, but gets a leg-bye
mis-hit, makes room and slashes at it, bottom hand comes off, lobs down the ground, but bounces before reaching long-off
Nehra, after playing sensibly for a considerable period of time, plays an ugly across-the-line-swipe as opposed to giving PK the strike. Misses, and the middle stump is hit
Munaf looks to make room and play the customary dab to third man, Watson follows him, to an extent that it misses both the batsman and the leg stump
Munaf plays the dab again, Watson is bang on off stump this time, and Munaf misses. India are bowled out, with PK playing well, but with two overs still to go

inn2.comm: off first ball, leans into the drive, full face of the bat, beats mid-off, the timing and the fast outfield carry it to the boundary
length ball, outside off, no swing, defended off the front foot
no swing, Watson presses forward, drives square, one bounce to Jadeja at point
on the pads, full, and flicked away for one to fine leg
hint of inswing, starts leg, moves away from Marsh, defended off the front foot, towards mid-off
lets this one go outside off, bounces twice before reaching Dhoni
pushes a back-of-a-length delivery off the back foot
big shout for catch down the leg side, Tarapore has no doubt it's off the thigh pad. Nehra is confident, swinging in, and it did indeed take the pad on the way
swing again, this time Watson makes full contact, but drives it straight to midwicket
swing again, down the leg side again, this time it misses everything and is a wide
swings into the pads again, played with soft hands, one bounce to short midwicket
starts with an off-stump line, swings in, better delivery, but Watson presses forward and defends
this one goes with the angle, and meets a superb shot. Just a check-square-drive, the open face and Nehra's pace give it enough power, and it is placed very well, between backward point and third man
pitched up, driven back to the bowler by Marsh
outswinger, moving in towards Marsh's off stump, he gets on to the front foot and plays it watchfully
inswinger this time, starts outside off off and moves away from Marsh who lets it go. Again it bounces in front of Dhoni
this time he starts straighter, Marsh flicks it off the pads to get off the mark
short ball, Watson stays on the crease and punches it back. PK does well to stop four off his own bowling
an early Christmas gift there, leg-side half-volley, Watson picks it up and deposits it to the square-leg boundary
pitched up, outside off, Marsh shoulders arms
length ball, just outside off, defended with an open face
staying around that off-stump line, 141ks, Marsh gets on to the front foot and plays it back to the bowler

lovely cover-driver, it was pitched up, he pressed forward, and goes through with a drive even as it is moving away. All along the ground, beats short cover and extra cover. And Sehwag could have done better at extra cover
short outside leg, he pulls, is hurried into the shot, doesn't make good connection, but it is enough to fly away to the fine-leg boundary
hits his customary length, around off, pretty straight, punched back to mid-off
length ball, 133ks, around off, driven powerfully down the ground, can't beat mid-off

Munaf has got this wicket because he gets close to the stumps while bowling... pitched leg, going straight and the umpire Asoka de Silva thinks it didn't have enough angle to miss off. Marsh didn't help his case by playing across the line. Hawkeye says it would have taken the top of outside of off stump
lovely half-volley to welcome Ponting, he doesn't mind it, steps forward, gets to the pitch, and drives it straight down the ground
outside off, lunges forward and lets it go
back of a length, Ponting comes forward and defends it to cover
big shout first up, new ball doesn't turn and beats Watson's forward defensive. Good decision, the angle taking it down the leg side
another straight delivery, pushed at it, outside the line, almost a return catch
presses forward and defends it towards Gambhir at silly mid-off/spoint... one bounce
angles in, turns it around the corner for one
plays for the spin again, and is saved by the inside edge on to the pad
presses forward again and defends a full delivery to the right of Jadeja
driven away beautifully, lunges forward, length delivery, opens the face at the last moment, almost blocks it, and the timing carries it to cover boundary
length ball, off-stump line, defended back to the bowler
lunges forward again, and defends towards cover
again he is fully forward to defends a length ball back to the bowler
length ball, Ponting presses forward again, defends with an open face
this one angles into the pads a bit, played one bounce to Tendulkar at silly mid-on
flighted outside off, Watson lets it go
another flighted delivery, Watto comes forward and defends
angles into the pads, Watto flicks it away, Yuvi makes a diving save at square leg
flat arm ball, Watson makes room and late-cuts it, into the ground, past first slip, lovely shot
Raina misses a direct-hit, Watson had hit straight to him at cover and run, Dhoni collected at a half-volley and removed the bails, but Ponting makes it in time
poor delivery, short, but he has a fielder for the poor delivery, at deep midwicket, so it's just one
Munaf keeps it in the channel, just outside off, just short of driving length, Ponting lunges forward and defends
this is fuller, Ponting drives towards mid-on
slower ball, 121ks, Ponting comes forward, but then waits and sees it off
normal pace, 134ks, Ponting comes forward again, gets the inside half of the bat, dot ball towards square leg
this is a wide half-volley, driven powerfully, but not placed well enough to miss Raina at cover
maiden over, pulls back the length, Ponting waits on the back foot and steers it towards backward point
another big shout, pitches middle, holds its line, hits Watson on the back leg, this was close. Hawkeye says the height would have saved him
sharp turn, beats Watson outside off
full, on the pads, driven to wide of mid-on
Gambhir almost pulls off a freak catch, Ponting pushes in front of his body, in the air towards silly point, it goes too fast but Gambhir gets a hand to it and can't hold on to the rebound
arm ball, defended off the back foot
Ponting pushes in front of his body again, but gets it all along the ground towards cover
Munaf continues, with length and just short of length, on and outside off, Watson defends
lovely late-cut, Watson waits and waits, gets room, and runs it fine just wide of Dhoni
plays it late again, but off the front foot this time, and gets a single to third man
Ponting lunges forward again, and pushes it despite not getting to the pitch of it, gets it along the ground towards mid-off
pushes forward and defends with an open face
another forward press and another straight defensive shot
arm ball, on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler
short, breaking away, punched down the ground
quicker delivery, Ponting takes the risk staying at the back foot, opens the face, makes enough contact and beats cover. Outfield is quick enough
presses forward, and defends with an open face
flights this one, draws Ponting forward, sharp turn, beats the bat, Dhoni whips the bails off, but Ponting's back foot is in
flat ball, outside off, punched down the ground
flighted just outside off, turning in, Ponting presses forward and defends
another flighted delivery, 87ks, but overpitched and driven the ground easily
shorter this time, Watson stays back and whips it towards deep backward square leg
straighter delivery, Ponting comes forward and looks to play it to leg, but gets the leading edge, which lands safely towards cover
another toppie, another outside edge, with bat face turning in his hand, but he gets two this time wide of short third
slower, shorter this time, regulation offbreak, turned around the corner
Jadeja has him groping a bit, comes forward and defends away from the body
whoa, flat, angling in, breaking away, quick pace, Watson knows not what to do
slightly short, looks to pull, gets bottom edge onto pad
gloved, just short of slip, beautiful bowling, breaking away from just outside off, takes the glove
another sharp delivery, beats him outside off
good shot, goood shot, slightly short, and he rocks back in a jiffy and pulls it to midwicket boundary
again Ponting lunges forward and defends
pitches middle, beats a defensive shot, ends up just outside leg
sharp turn, pitches middle and beats both Ponting and Dhoni, umpire calls byes and not wides
another good delivery, draws him forward, makes him poke, and Ponting ends up playing inside the line
too straight again, spins sharply again, but takes the pad and goes towards fine leg
middle-stump line again, and he turns it around the corner for one
Jadeja in the zone again, off-stump line, not drivable, Ponting leans forward and defends
shorter, pushed off the back foot towards mid-off
short again, cuts but can;t beat cover
fuller now, outside off, Ponting lunges forward and shoulders arm
back to the testing zone, Ponting back to pushing forward and defending
ditto with the last ball of the over, maiden over
starts with a fulltoss, and Watto is jumping on to these opportunities, driving this - nay crashing this one - past cover
gets it to pitch this time, Watson defends it in front of his pad
outside off, Watto lets it go
flighted, drawing him forward, Watson gets into the front foot and defends
another bad delivery, and again Watto is not letting them go, short and wide, and he cuts it hard, to the right of sweeper-cover - 50 of the partnership is up
flighted this time, and he comes forward and pats it again
back of a length, going with the arm, defended off the back foot
draws Ponting forward, who gets to the pitch of the ball and drives it for one to long-off
full ball, on the pads, and played towards mid-on
superb shot, this is not a bad delivery, slightly short, and he cuts, and he beats both the slips and backward point, all along the ground
looks for the same shot, but is beaten this time
into the pads, he dabs it towards fine leg and takes a single
lobs it into the leg side, leading edge, and agonisingly for India it falls safe
sharp turn, starts off, turning down the leg side
pushes forward and pokes again, bat-pad, but there is no forward short leg
flighted, into the pads, and he turns it around the corner with soft hands and comes back for two
it stops him from pressing forward and dead-batting. This time he sweeps from outside off, and gets a single to deep backward square

Harbhajan gets Watto again, with the overspinner, on the slog sweep again. There has been some needling going on through the series between these two. That perhaps brought out the big shot, the bowl does;t turn in as much as he expects, and the top edge goes straight to first slip
full delivery, Ponting presses forward and defends again
another full delivery, another forward defensive
short and flat, and pushed straight to cover
full, into the pads, and turned around the corner for one
plays with an open face, one bounce to gully
opens the face again, outside off, and gets it past a diving Raina at gully
into his pads, and he gets one to square leg
leading edge, hands turning to close the face too early, bounces to the left of and short of Harbhajan
played uppishly again, gets a single to midwicket

India are back in business with Ponting's wicket. He has been pushing forward and poking all innings long, this time it turns sharply, takes the inside edge, onto the pad, and through to leg slip. The crowd can feel it now
byes, crucial byes, Hussey lets a topspinner outside off alone, and Dhoni doesn't collect it cleanly
angling in, pitches middle, turns away, defended off the back foot
full ball, on the pads, turned away for one to square leg
big spin, through the gate of Hussey, missing off by inches
short, into the pads, played to midwicket for one
overpitched, driven down the ground for one
another overpitched delivery, driven to long -on
shortens the length a bit, and he immediately gets the inside half of the bat for one to fine leg
thrown up, outside off, spinning in, and defended off the front foot
gets close to his feet now, and he drives it down to long-on
flighted outside off, turns away, defended off the front foot
beats him outside off, with sharp turn, Hussey ends up playing inside the line
flighted outside off, and Hussey comes forward and defends
shorter, outside off, and he lets this one go
that spits from a length, Whit is forward and drops his wrist, takes the bottom hand, somehow manages to keep it down. Hussey is alert to call him through for one
gets forward, opens the face and takes a sharp single to short third
another ball in the channel, just a touch too straight, and turned away to square leg
spins in sharply, he guides it leg slip, on the bounce
comes forward again and defends
shorter, stays back, and punches it back to the bowler
White comes forward, gets to the pitch of it, and pushes it down to long-on
this one kicks up from a length again, Hussey stays back, drops his wrists, manages to keep it down and take a single
overpitched, chance to take an easy single, but White drives straight back to Bhaj
this time he angles into the pads, and is played towards short midwicket
is beaten on the forward defensive but has got the front pad outside off
is beaten on the sweep this time, but has got his front pad outside off again
full, overpitched, driven down the ground
flighted delivery, but shorter in length, defended off the front foot
another forward press and a defensive shot to mid-on
outside edge, flat delivery, played with soft hands, so it bounces before second slip
full ball, and driven down the ground
stays back, opens the face, and gets a single to short third
flighted delivery, middle-stump line, played towards short cover
short delivery, pushed into the leg side, Gambhir at forward short leg, gets a foot to it and no run ensues
short again, and cut to right of sweeper-cover for two
steps forward, and smothers the spin
angling into the pads, Hussey looks to play it towards midwicket, the break takes the leading edge, still he gets a single to cover
plays it around his front pad, wide of short midwicket, and takes an easy single
overpitched, and into the pads, and played to wide of long-on
pitches middle, turns in, beats him but is going down the leg side
stays back and waits for the ball to turn and gets a single to short fine
stays back and defends back to the bowler
turns it around the corner for a single to fine leg
turning in, lets it turn and then closes the face on it
gets forward, defends watchfully
stays back, and defends back to the bowler
overpitched, driven to long-off
sweeps, misses but he has got outside the line
presses forward and defends back to the bowler
flat and full, Hussey gets forward and defends
full again, and he gets on the front foot and plays it watchfully under his eyes
shorter and flatter, cuts and misses
full this one, gets to the pitch of the ball, and drives it to sweeper-cover
smeared into his pads, he gets to the back foot and pushes it into the leg side
pitches it up, turning in towards off stump, and defended towards midwicket
flat and full, turning,k defended back to the bowler
another flat delivery, played back to the bowler again
overpitched, driven down to long-on for one
full into the pads, turned away to deep square leg
flighted outside off, defended with an open face
smart batting and running, from wide of off and past slip, and they come back for two. Until now they were doing it in singles
short, around off, cut away, but can't beat cover
flighted outside off, and he comes forward and defends
looks for reverse sweep, Yuvraj sees it and smears it outside off
Hussey smothers the spin again, right down to the pitch of it
flat yorker this time, dug out without trouble
another flat delivery, stays back and dead-bats it
on and around off, defended towards short leg
flat delivery, punched down the ground
full delivery, played with soft hands, just to wide of mid-on, for one
back of a length again, punched down the ground for one
flighted on the leg-stump line, and flicked away for one
turns into his pads, he waits for the break and turns it to fine leg
flat on the stumps and he clips an easy single between midwicket and mid-on as Australia ease along
tossed up just outside off and Hussey defends watchfully
a bit wider so Hussey nicely runs it off the face behind gully, really good placement and the sweeper cannot run around in time, thats a very good shot
flat, short, wide and he cuts it out to the sweeper
good ball, pitches on a length and goes on and beats White who pushes down the wrong line
back to full and flat, gets a hint of turn and White stabs it away
flat on the leg stump line, easily turned to square for one more
reaches out and drives the ball into the yawning space at cover
big appeal from one that skids on and straightens to hit Hussey as he presses forward, but he's struck just outside the line of off stump so that cannot be given out
gets over a full ball and pushes it away wide of the fielder
gives this one a tweak, pitches it shorter, White defends off the back foot
similar delivery, not much turn but the length is good enough to press White back again and he hurries to defend
on the stumps and nicely worked out to deep midwicket for one
nice and full with that angle into White, who pushes forward in a hurry
meets another full delivery shaping in with a full face and pushes it down to mid-off who is a bit deep
holds back the length and White runs the ball down to third man, he has to hold back and opens the face as he plays away from the body
bad ball, too much room outside off and Hussey gets over the ball to back-cut it wide of the catcher and beating third man by some distance
tip and run to keep strike, just gets over the ball nicely and dabs it in front of extra cover, calling White for the run
round the stumps, flat and into the pads, easy single ensues
same delivery to the right-hander, but Gambhir at forward short leg takes it on the shin
he's gone, walks across, and plays across the line, the ball turns and skids along, hitting him below the knee roll, in front of middle stump
almost a yorker, driven to mid-off
that was close, drift, draws him forward, spins through the gate, takes the inside edge and just misses the stumps
this one is flatter and easier to negotiate, and he gets one to square leg
overpitched delivery, driven back to Harbhajan
flighted outside off, Voges plays inside the line of it
tossed up nicely, Voges waits for the turn and then dead-bats
angling into the pads, and pushed towards mid-on
topspinner, stays back in the crease, and defends
tossed up this time, inviting a drive, he plays it to wide of mid-off for one
angling into the pads, and he helps it along to square leg
flighted outside off and defended back to the bowler
poor delivery, short, and he pulls it off the front foot, bisecting the two fielders in the deep
presses all the way forward and defends
driven back to Raina at the half-volley
quicker delivery, just outdie off, stays in the crease and plays it back to Raina
flat and full, defended off the front foot
shorter, Hussey stays back and pushes it down to long-off
short and flat ball, played back past the bowler
overpitched, on the pads, and driven down to long-on
smeared into the pads, he just helps it along its way to square leg boundary
slower now, he gets on the front foot and plays it back to the bowler
topspinner, Hussey goes deep inside the crease and defends
flighted, around off stump, and defended off the front foot
angled into the pads, and turned around the corner for one
short, turning in, and cut away to wide of point for one
full ball, around the off-stump line, and defended into the covers
shorter, goes into the crease and gets a single to midwicket
offbreak, pitched outside leg, so no chance of lbw
stays back and turns it around the corner, gets a single
legbreak, long hop, put away between long-on and midwicket
another long hop, another legbreak, and this time he has pulled it for four, ever closer to a series win
the googly will do, long hop again, pulled away to square-leg boundary, and Australia win 4-2
